::Blacknightmare::

Before Blacknightmare open her com link said at Kiollfest "I'll try 
to win time... Trust me"

"Megatron" replied Blacknighmare "I did a trade to help at Kit kat, 
and in honor at her memory I should tell you that we are wasting 
time... in this stupid argument that who's the leader - our commen 
enemy, The alliance could attack us and if they find us divided they 
will destroy us "

aNS SHE  close her comm link and comment "I don't trust more in his 
fooolish common sense" and told at darkmouse "Could you somehting to 
stopp his plans?"

rebel
